name: A. Superhero Transformation
statement:
We all know that a superhero can transform to certain other superheroes.
But not all Superheroes can transform to any other superhero. A
superhero with name s can transform to another superhero with name t if
s can be made equal to t by changing any vowel in s to any other vowel
and any consonant in s to any other consonant. Multiple changes can be
made., we consider the letters ”, ”, ”, ” and ” to be vowels and all the
other letters to be consonants.Given the names of two superheroes,
determine if the superhero with name s can be transformed to the
Superhero with name t.
